participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and cheerful, she enjoys working with newborns and has a passion for creating joyful experiences.
participant_1.background: Emily has been a baby delivery nurse for over five years, and she loves sharing her experiences with others.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adventurous, he loves exploring new places and enjoys spending time at amusement parks.
participant_2.background: Lucas is a travel blogger who often shares his experiences at various attractions, and he has a soft spot for Disneyland.
